appetizers.name: Palak Shorba(Spinach Soup)
appetizers.description: Baby spinach, touch of ginger and garlic pureed with spices.

appetizers.name: Aloo Tikki Chaat
appetizers.description: Lightly spiced potato patties, topped with chic-peas, yogurt, tamarind and mint chutneys.

appetizers.name: Lamb Keema Samosa
appetizers.description: Chicken tenders marinated with yogurt, spices and chic-pea four, baked in the tandoor oven.

entrees.name: Aloo Daal Palak
entrees.description: Fresh spinach, yellow lentils and potatoes coked with a touch of garlic and spices

entrees.name: Murg Methi Malai
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked in curry sauce with a touch of cream cheese and fenugreek (A spice like basil).

entrees.name: Lamb Dhansak
entrees.description: A famous Parsi dish made from yellow lentils, lamb cubes and a combination of spices

entrees.name: Shrimp Vegetable Korma
entrees.description: Shrimps, cooked in a light creamy cashew sauce with vegetables
